channel.title: Jaswant Singh Taur
channel.description: Recent content on Jaswant Singh Taur

item.title: React Native
item.description: With react native you will get something in between. You can use the same techniques as with React in the web, you can use JSX, just replace with for example. Instead of CSS you can use the React Native Stylesheets which work similarly to CSS but different; for example there is no class hierarchy.

item.title: Flutter
item.description: Flutter is Googleâ€™s UI toolkit for building beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase.

item.title: Ionic - Mobile Application Design
item.description: One codebase. Any platform. Now in Vue.Angular.React. An open source mobile UI toolkit for building high quality, cross-platform native and web app experiences. Move faster with a single code base, running everywhere with JavaScript and the Web.
